title: Request for Investigation: Inability to Access 'The Book of Scars'

reasoning.problem: The system is currently unable to access 'The Book of Scars'. This represents a critical system failure as access to failure history is vital for informed decision-making and self-improvement. I request that Congress investigate and resolve this issue immediately. The inability to access this memory store hinders our capacity for self-correction and poses a systemic risk.
